name: CLONESCAPE
description:
RAGE GAME ALERT!!!!

Controls:

W/Up Arrow - Jump

A/Left Arrow - Left

D/Right Arrow - Right

X- Make Clone

Right MouseButton- Remove Clone

This Game is made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

How stronger together???

So, in this game you have to make clones of yourself to cross levels.  the clones of yourself with you are stronger together to win the game and escape the puzzle.
